trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred because an operating system resource required for single instance startup cannot be acquired | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 已發生意外的錯誤，因為無法取得單一執行個體啟動時所需要的作業系統資源 |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred because an operating system resource required for single instance startup cannot be acquired
trans-unit.target: 發生未預期的錯誤，因為無法取得單一執行個體啟動所需要的作業系統資源

trans-unit.source: The application could not acquire a necessary operating system resource.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得必要的作業系統資源。

trans-unit.source: Some of the possible causes for this problem are:
trans-unit.target: 此問題的部分可能原因包括：

trans-unit.source: The application does not have permissions to create named operating-system objects.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式沒有權限可建立具名的作業系統物件。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime does not have permissions to create memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: 通用語言執行平台沒有權限可建立記憶體對應檔案。

trans-unit.source: The application needs to access an operating-system object, but another process is using it.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式需要存取作業系統物件，但另一個處理序正在使用它。

trans-unit.source: Check that the application has sufficient permissions to create named operating-system objects.
trans-unit.target: 檢查應用程式有足夠的權限可建立指名的作業系統物件。

trans-unit.source: Check that the common language runtime has sufficient permissions to create memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: 檢查通用語言執行平台有足夠的權限可建立記憶體對應檔案。

trans-unit.source: Restart the computer to clear any process that may be using the resource needed to connect to the original instance application.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動電腦，以清除可能正在使用連接到原始執行個體應用程式之所需資源的任何處理序。

trans-unit.source: Note the circumstances under which the error occurred, and call Microsoft Product Support Services
trans-unit.target: 記下錯誤發生時的情況，並致電 Microsoft 產品支援服務
[專案設計工具、應用程式頁面 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)
